body: I came here for a nut, not for feels god damn it
Only an attention-whorecunt would be reposting the same manga FOR EVERY CHAPTER.

The last part... It makes me reminisce the past where we part goodbye with the teacher and classmates. Remembering the hardships, saying goodbye to the teacher, table, friends... Having last party and remembering stupid things the last few years. Man, a good time.

Oh i'm soooo soon here.
but i think this is a repost with only one new doujin added in??
(and apparently you cant post another comment on another doujin after you just did a comment on a another doujin a couple of seconds ago before this one. What a bummer)
